topic.title: Introduction
topic.shortdesc: Welcome to breakfast at Marjan's! Today I have left a set of recipes for you to follow, so that your experience this weekend is that much more easy and relaxing. After you have enjoyed your breakfasts, a clean-up guide can be found to help with the little or big messes you may have made in your breakfast adventures. A troubleshooting and reference guide have been included for your convinience.
